_header: Of Saint Thomas speak will we
Subjects: Thomas the apostle, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Thomas the Apostle in the Scottish Legendary

CULGg26.First Lines:
Of sancte thomas spek vil wenext sancte Johne in his
                    degre…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…& get vs grace we hynne ma twynebut ded schame &
                    deitly syne
CULGg26.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Barbours des schottischen Nationaldichters Legendensammlung.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 1.62-72.
Metcalfe,  William Musham,
                        ed.  
             Legends of the Saints, in the Scottish dialect of the fourteenth
                century….
             6 pts. in 3 vols. 
             Scottish Text Society
         13, 18, 23, 25, 35, 37. Edinburgh, London: Blackwood, 1896: 1.129-49.
